arStrings.szText: After generating {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Fury your next direct damage creates {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} {c_important}Dust Devils{/c} that deal {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} damage to enemies along their path.

After generating {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Fury your next direct damage creates {c_important}Dust Devils{/c} that deal {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} damage.
